summary: ENB 0.143 - A realistic ENB with a cinematic touch by Tywele
descriptionHtml:
[font="Roboto"]
[center]
[size=15]Cinematically Realistic ENB[/size]
[color=red]Warning: This file doesn't contain all necessary files. You have to download one file seperately. More information in the install section.[/color]
[color=green]Information: Endorsing a mod isn't that difficult and doesn't consume massive time so it is very appreciated if you endorse this mod if you really like it. Feedback in the comments section is also very appreciated. Doesn't matter if it's in German or English.[/color]

[IMG]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/7223/2012071500006.jpg[/IMG]
[/center]

[size=6]Description[/size]
With this ENB I tried to achieve a realistic look. Maybe I didn't hit quite as good as I wanted and so it got this cinematic touch. But I liked it so I kept it. And now here it is. No additional programs or mods just pure ENB.

[size=4]Features[/size]
SSAO
Bokeh Depth of Field (optional)
Bloom
Sky Lighting
Complex Indirect Lighting
Godrays
Letterbox

[center]
[IMG]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/9636/2012071700006.jpg[/IMG]
[/center]

[size=6]Installation[/size]
1. Download the original ENB file from Boris Vorontsov's homepage right here: [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]ENB[/url]
2. Extract the content of the wrapper folder inside the archive into your Skyrim folder where your TESV.exe lies
3. Download my ENB
4. Extract it to the same place as the original and answer with yes if it asks to override files
5. Make sure you have set bFloatPointRenderTarget to 1 in your SkyrimPrefs.ini
6. Activate the CRENBWeather.esp in any mod manager or the Skyrim launcher.
7. Done - play and have fun!

[center]
[IMG]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/4343/2012071300007.jpg[/IMG]
[/center]
[size=6]General Information[/size]

I won't add the "Download with Nexus Mod Manager" button! This mod can't be installed by Mod Managers.

[size=4]Future Plans[/size]
[s]In the future I want to add some lighting changes for different weather conditions because sometimes it's just to dark for example during a snow or rain storm at daytime[/s] Mostly done.

[size=4]Recommended Mods[/size]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043/]Enhanced Lights and FX[/url]

[size=4]Incompatibilities[/size]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Climates of Tamriel[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7654]Realistic Lighting With Customization[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1875]RCRN - Realistic Colors and Real Nights[/url]

[size=4]Known issues[/size]
- Dark Snow/Rain Storms during day

[size=4]Performance[/size]
ENB's are very performance intensive! If your PC isn't good enough you will get serious performance problems.
I run this ENB at 1080p and Ultra Settings with 4xMSAA and 2x SGSSAA with many texture mods and I get nearly constant 35-40FPS

PC specs: 
i7 3770K @ 3,4GHz Turbo 3,9GHz
Nvidia Geforce GTX 670
8GB DDR3 1600MHz RAM

You have been warned! ;)

[/font]
author: Tywele

files.name: Cinematically Realistic ENB 1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed ridiculously high AuroraBorealisCurve
Lowered SubSurfaceScattering value during daytime

files.name: Cinematically Realistic ENB 1_2
files.changelogHtml:
Adapted to ENB 0.117
Includes fixed new version of Matso\'s Bloom
Depth of Field is now optional and has to be enabled first

files.name: Cinematically Realistic ENB 1_3
files.changelogHtml:
Added black Subsurface Scattering textures for the body, so only trees and other stuff will be effected by it
Updated the config to work with ENB 0.122
Reduced letterbox effect
Enabled Complex Indirect Lighting by default

files.name: Cinematically Realistic ENB 1_4
files.changelogHtml:
Adapted to ENB 0.126 (adjusted new values like seperated interior values for ambient occlusion)
Reworked specular values for days and interiors
Fixed foggy and hazy interiors

files.name: Cinematically Realistic ENB 1_5
files.changelogHtml:
Adapted to ENB 0.141
Reduced strength of sunrays
Fixed bright water LOD
Removed letterbox effect by default

files.name: Cinematically Realistic ENB 2_0
files.changelogHtml:
Adapted to ENB 0.143
Added weather plugin
Added fixed meshes for ENB made by mindflux
